mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL, R. * FROM ( SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') CREATE_DT, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICK, PROFILE_IMG, PARENT_REPLY_NO, REPLY_ST FROM REPLY_S JOIN MEMBER_S USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ) R WHERE REPLY_ST = 'N' START WITH PARENT_REPLY_NO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR REPLY_NO = PARENT_REPLY_NO ORDER SIBLINGS BY REPLY_NO;
